snippet.title: Eraser : Turnabout (1997) FMV game trailer
snippet.description:
You're John Krueger, The Eraser, and you've got a few hours to shut down a conspiracy that threatens the free world and to stop the latest terrorist strike.
Along the way, you'll shoot it out with well-armed teams of professional assassins, explore dangerous environments, piece together bizarre clues, and defeat deadly electronic counter measures.

You'll have a little help from your friends, but mostly you'll be on your own -- get used to it. ERASER-TURNABOUT, a two disk interactive adventure featuring arcade-style, high-speed shooting environments, variable outcomes and character interactions, compelling and challenging puzzles, plus full screen, full motion video navigation sequences designed specifically for Intel's MMX technology:
